dmca.title: copyright tattle tale
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: cekken@charter.net [mailto:cekken@charter.net] 
Sent: Sunday, May 01, 2005 2:25 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: illegal hosting

A kid I know named Josh is hosting illegal Lineage 2 stolen server files on
one of your hosts, the information for his server is:

Your server is online and available at the following:
Server Name: lynch
Server IP: 67.18.151.74
Netmask: 255.255.255.248
Gateway: 67.18.151.73
Available IPs: 67.18.151.74 - 78

NCsoft does not approve of people using stolen server files to host their
own versions of this game.
